country_dim_query: select distinct country_item_id, region as country_geo from base.dm_adobe_analytics_country_lookup
date_range_query: select distinct fis_monthstartdate::date -1, fis_monthenddate::date +1  from base.vdim_cal_date where fis_mnthshrtnm_year4 = 'INPUT_MONTH_VALUE'

date_range_historical: select e.fis_monthstartdate::date,current_date::date from (select distinct (date_trunc('month', start_date::date) - interval '15 month')::date as old_month from base.dm_adobe_analytics_executive_dashboard e where e.start_date::date in (select max(start_date::date) from base.dm_adobe_analytics_executive_dashboard))z inner join base.vdim_cal_date e on  old_month::date= e.cal_date::date
fis_qtr_start_date: select fis_quarterstartdate from base.vdim_cal_date where cal_date = current_date - interval '15 month'
